chapter.title: Getting Started
chapter.para: Getting started with Seam Solder is easy. If you are using Maven, then you can declare a dependency on Seam Seam (org.jboss.seam.solder:seam-solder:${seam.solder.version}, make sure you have the JBoss Maven repository enabled). Otherwise, add the jar to your compile time and runtime classpath.
